Title: Enacts the "shelter arrears eviction forestallment act"
Summary: Enacts the "shelter arrears eviction forestallment act" to provide emergency assistance for rent arrears for the prevention of eviction.
LawCode: Add ยง131-cc, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to enacting the "shelter arrears eviction forestallment act" to provide emergency assistance for rent arrears for the prevention of eviction
